content: slip_stitch in next space chain 3 counts as first double_crochet in the cluster holding back the last loop crochet 3 double_crochet into the same space then 40 clusters 8 yarn over and pull through all loops on hook to complete the first 40 spaces cluster chain 2 *cluster in next space chain 2* around join slip_stitch in next space chain 2 part of decrease 2 double_crochet is completed chain 3 *decrease 2 double_crochet in the same and next spaces chain 3* around to 40 decreases 9 complete the last decrease crochet the first part and join in the 40 spaces 2nd loop of the starting stitch mark spaces for round 12 slip_stitch to the center of next space chain 1 40 single_crochet 10 *single_crochet in space chain 3* around join 40 spaces chain 3 counts as first double_crochet 11 *3 double_crochet in next space double_crochet in next single_crochet* around do not crochet the 160 double_crochet last double_crochet join in the 3rd loop of the starting stitch chain 1 *single_crochet in each of 2 double_crochet decrease 2 tc in next marked space below in round 9 place legs 120 single_crochet 12 of each decrease before and after cluster 40 decreases skip next double_crochet in round 11 single_crochet in next double_crochet* around join mark first and last decreases for round 14 chain 1 40 single_crochet 13 *single_crochet in single_crochet chain 3 skip next 2 single_crochet* around join 40 spaces chain 1 decrease 2 tc in marked decreases below in round 12 80 single_crochet * single_crochet chain 3 single_crochet --- in next space in round 13 14 40 decreases decrease 2 tc in the same and next decreases below in round 12* 40 spaces around join slip_stitch to the center of next space chain 1 20 single_crochet 15 *single_crochet in space chain 3 20 double_crochet double_crochet chain 3 double_crochet --- in next space chain 3* around join 60 spaces chain 2 part of complex decrease is completed *chain 3 complex decrease double_crochet in the same single_crochet + fp double_crochet around 100 double_crochet next double_crochet 40 decreases 16 chain 1 5 double_crochet in next space chain 1 40 ch1 spaces complex decrease fp double_crochet around next double_crochet + double_crochet in next single_crochet* 20 ch3 spaces around to complete the last decrease crochet the first part and join in the 2nd loop of the starting stitch slip_stitch to the center of next space chain 1 *single_crochet in space chain 2 20 single_crochet fp double_crochet around each of next 2 double_crochet 120 fp double_crochet 17 fp double_crochet chain 3 fp double_crochet --- around next fp double_crochet 40 ch2 spaces fp double_crochet around each of next 2 double_crochet chain 2* around join 20 ch3 spaces mark ch3 spaces for round 20 40 single_crochet slip_stitch to and in next ch3 space chain 1 18 20 ch3 spaces * single_crochet chain 3 single_crochet --- in ch3 space chain 8* around join 20 ch8 spaces 20 single_crochet slip_stitch to the center of next space chain 1 19 220 double_crochet *single_crochet
